alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 31 at 10:36PM AKST until February 02 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM TUESDAY TO 6 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Haines and Haines Highway. * WHEN...From 6 PM Tuesday to 6 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow is expected across Upper Lynn Canal beginning Tuesday evening and continuing through late Wednesday night. Heaviest snowfall rates expected late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. Lighter snowfall rates likely Wednesday afternoon and evening. Additional light snow is expected to continue through the end of the week; however confidence is low regarding a possible transition to rain at sea level.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
